mapper.update: UPDATE delivery SET invoice_no = #{invoice_no}, courier = #{courier}, start_date = sysdate, cmplt_date = sysdate + NUMTODSINTERVAL(FLOOR(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(2, 3) * 60), 'MINUTE') WHERE order_no = #{order_no}
UPDATE orders SET order_status = 2 WHERE order_no IN (SELECT o.order_no FROM orders o, delivery d WHERE o.order_no = d.order_no AND o.order_status = 1 AND sysdate >= cmplt_date)
